extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    PHIL250 or permission of the Department.

basic.description: The nature and varieties of metaphysics, including rationalistic 'Platonist' and empirical/descriptive 'Aristotelian' approaches. Positivistic and pragmatic anti-metaphysical 'critiques' and verificationism. Contemporary analytical metaphysics after Quine and Strawson.
basic.subject: PHIL
basic.title: Metaphysics
